duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate stand-up forklift/walkie truck to convey materials and items within the facility.
Sort and place materials in designated areas based on predetermined sequence.
Store perishable goods in refrigerated rooms and manage inventory records.
Fill requisitions for materials and distribute items to production workers or assembly line.
Use computer to enter records and complete requisition forms for supply orders.
Operate pallet wrapping equipment and cardboard/trash compactor.
Occasionally move Semi Trailers with yard tractor as needed.
